pageContext.claim: “93% of our domestic manufacturers have expressed optimism in the future, a record.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is citing a survey by the National Association of Manufacturers but that is not necessarily representative of all manufacturers. NAM declined to say whether NAM members are randomly surveyed -- and NAM members make up just six percent of manufacturing firms. This is a very low level of coverage for a survey of any population attempting to represent all industries.
